Judul: MEASURING THE EFFECTIVENESS OF GREEN ADVERTISING USING AIDA MODEL
Abstrak: Advertising has become one of the most important aspects for promoting products or services that the company wants to offer. The main purposes of advertisement are to introduce the market about the products or services, creating brand recall and brand awareness, and to inform the product knowledge and benefits to the customer.
Kata Kunci: in-store promotion, Awareness, AIDA model, effective
